summary.para: The CERT_KEY_CONTEXT structure contains data associated with a CERT_KEY_CONTEXT_PROP_ID property.
The size, in bytes, of this structure.
A cryptographic service provider (CSP) handle. This member is used when the dwKeySpec member contains AT_KEYEXCHANGE or AT_SIGNATURE.
A CNG CSP handle. This member is used when the dwKeySpec member contains CERT_NCRYPT_KEY_SPEC.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This member is not available.
The specification of the private key to retrieve.
The following dwKeySpec values are defined for the default provider.

description.para: Keys used to encrypt/decrypt session keys. The handle to the CSP is contained in the hCryptProv member.
Keys used to create and verify digital signatures. The handle to the CSP is contained in the hCryptProv member.
Keys associated with a CNG CSP. The handle to the CNG CSP is set in the hNCryptProv member.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not used.
